transcript: Yeah, everyone else was so the same thing. I mean, look, I keep just excited, keep just coming back for more, you know, keep just thinking life's gonna start any minute now.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Yeah.  Everyone else was sold the same thing.  I mean, look, it keeps us excited, it keeps us coming back for more and you know, keeps us thinking life's going to start any minute now.
